Uses of Interface
io.netty5.handler.codec.compression.Compressor

  • Packages that use Compressor 
    Package Description
    io.netty5.handler.codec.compression
    Encoder and decoder which compresses and decompresses ByteBufs in a compression format such as zlib, gzip, and Snappy.
    io.netty5.handler.codec.http
    Encoder, decoder and their related message types for HTTP.
    io.netty5.handler.codec.http2
    Handlers for sending and receiving HTTP/2 frames.

    • Uses of Compressor in io.netty5.handler.codec.compression

      Classes in io.netty5.handler.codec.compression that implement Compressor 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BrotliCompressor
      Compress a ByteBuf with the brotli format.
      class  Bzip2Compressor
      Compresses a ByteBuf using the Bzip2 algorithm.
      class  FastLzCompressor
      Compresses a ByteBuf using the FastLZ algorithm.
      class  Lz4Compressor
      Compresses a ByteBuf using the LZ4 format.
      class  LzfCompressor
      Compresses a ByteBuf using the LZF format.
      class  LzmaCompressor
      Compresses a ByteBuf using the LZMA algorithm.
      class  SnappyCompressor
      Compresses a ByteBuf using the Snappy framing format.
      class  ZlibCompressor
      Compresses a ByteBuf using the deflate algorithm.
      class  ZstdCompressor
      Compresses a ByteBuf using the Zstandard algorithm.
